metadata.title: DeLorean DMC-12 Remake Rumors Still Going
metadata.description: An automotive icon keeps trying to leap into the new century.
metadata.author: Steven Symes

metadata.title: This DeLorean Barn Find Finally Sees Daylight After 32 Years | Motorious.com
metadata.description: The car was parked in the barn back in 1986.
metadata.author: Amie Williams

sections: One man has decided to turn a car made popular by Back to the Future into some crazy builds.
Rich Weissensel is a bit of a
nut. Not only does the guy love the
and own several, he’s turned many of them into some of the wildest vehicles you could imagine. Among his collection of
is a monster truck, a stretch limousine, and a hovercraft.
In the video below you get to see these creations in action. Yes, they’re not just movie set pieces which look like they work, these
can actually off-road, hover no top of water, and more. Each one is a functional piece of automotive art, fascinating people of all ages.

Perhaps the most iconic of Weissensel’s creations is a Time Machine Replica. It looks pretty good and would fool pretty much anyone who saw it, which considering all the detailed modifications used on the
Weissensel is a software engineer – not exactly the kind of guy who’d expect to build all kinds of

. But he’s been reworking the stainless steel bodies for the past 14 years and has become quite good at it. It all started when he met John DeLorean himself at a car show. Weissensel had some sketches for DeLorean builds he showed the man who liked them. The rest is history.

Of course, not everyone is a fan of what Weissensel does. Some are purists who think cars should be maintained in their original state. While that’s a perfectly respectable stance to take, it’s also unimaginative and not much fun. Constantly tuning and tinkering with cars is a legitimate way to express your appreciation for a certain model. But, as they say, to each his own.
Those naysayers should know Weissensel has a code of conduct. The man only tinkers with DeLoreans that have been wrecked. So he’s not cutting into one that’s still in
, leaving those to the people with less imagination.
